document_data.name: Hall of Rulership
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of rulership''' was the government's seat of power in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] following the city's destruction in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
document_data.Location: The hall was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Bridge Street]].
document_data.Description: A lavish room called the Lords' Room served as a meeting places for Zhentil Keep's rulers.
document_data.Inhabitants: Lord [[Orgauth]] throne room was located within the Hall of Rulership. Other Lords of Zhentil Keep had offices here as well. A scribe named [[Zark (human)|Zark]] worked out of the Hall of Rulership.
document_data.History: The Hall of Rulership was once a fortress.
document_data.Defenses: A squad of 15 [[Zhentilar]] soldiers was present within the Hall at all times.
